CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	NONE                             	NONE                       
B            	FLIGHT PERSONNEL                 	FLTP                       
C            	FLIGHT & MAINTENANCE PERSONNEL  	FLMT                       
D            	FLT MAINT FAA ST POLICIES/PROC   	FMST                      
E            	FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR                	FLTI                       
F            	FLT OPER FAA STANDARDS POL/PRO   	FOSS                       
G            	FLIGHT, MAINTENANCE & OPERATOR   	FLMO                       
H            	FLT, FAA STANDARDS POL/ PROCS    	FLPP                       
I            	MAINTENANCE PERSONNEL            	MAIN                       
J            	MAINTENANCE AND OPERATOR         	MTOP                      
K            	MT FAA ST POLICIES/PROCEDURES    	MTST                      
L            	MAINT, OPER FAA ST POL OR PROC   	MOST                      
M            	MANUFACTURER                     	MANU                       
N            	MANUFACTURER AND OPERATOR        	MAOP                      
O            	MA & FAA ST POLICIES, OR PROCS   	MAST                       
P            	OPER FLT SCH, A/TAXI, AGR/ETC.   	OPER                      
Q            	OP & FAA ST POLICIES, OR PROCS  	OPST                      
R            	FAA PERSONNEL                    	FAAP                      
S            	FAA PERSONNEL & FACILITIES       	FAPF                      
T            	FAA PERS & FAA ST POL/PROCS      	FPST                      
U            	FAA FACILITIES                   	FAAF                       
V            	FAA FAC/ST POLICIES/PROCEDURES   	FFST                       
W            	REPAIR STATION                   	RPST                       
X            	R S & FAA ST, POLICIES OR PROC   	RSST                       
Y            	FAA STS, POLICIES OR PROCEDURE   	FAST                       
Z            	OTHER                            	OTHR                       
99999        	REMED ACT AREA INVALID           	ERROR
